casebody.data:
Graceanne ADAMO, Petitioner, v. MERIT SYSTEMS PROTECTION BOARD, Respondent, and Department of Defense, Intervenor. No. 2006-3184. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. March 9, 2007.

Before MAYER, LOURIE, and DYK, Circuit Judges.

Judgment

PER CURIAM:

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
